articles.title: Donald Trump's Stock Has Lost More Than Half Its Value Since Going Public - Newsweek
articles.description: The value of shares in Trump Media & Technology Group (TMTG), which owns Truth Social, is declining.
articles.content:
The value of a share in Donald Trump's company Trump Media & Technology Group (TMTG) has declined by more than half the amount it was valued at when the stock went public.
In March, shareholders… [+3054 chars]
